title: A short defence of the church and clergy of England wherein some of the common objections against both are answered, and the means of union briefly considered.
author: Grove, Robert, 1634-1696.
publisher: Printed by J. Macock for Walter Kettilby ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Robert Grove. cf. NUC pre-1956.
